professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with over 8 years of expertise in managing Oracle databases across multiple platforms. Proficient in RAC, ASM, Data Guard, and Golden Gate. Strong communication and problem-solving skills.

key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle databases across various platforms including HP-UX
Implementing and managing RAC (Real Application Clusters) and ASM (Automatic Storage Management).
Upgrading and transitioning databases from older versions to Oracle 11g and 10g.
Configuring and managing Oracle RMAN (Recovery Manager) for backup and recovery.
Performing database exports and imports using Data Pump technology.
Providing technical support for IT infrastructure and applications.
Assisting in database management and system optimization.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Systems
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

technical_skills:
Oracle Databases (8i, 9i, 10g, 11g)",
            "RAC and Grid Infrastructure with ASM",
            "Oracle RMAN, Data Guard, Golden Gate",
            "Oracle Enterprise Manager, Recovery Manager (RMAN)",
            "Data Pump Export/Import, Regular Export/Import
tools_and_software:
HP-UX, SunOS/Solaris, Linux, AIX, Windows Server",
            "OpenText, Putty, Hummingbird, WinSCP, Remote Desktop Connection
